ps2.3:39.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi—
ps2.3:39.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
ps2.3:40.6: Imesam khvaham, avuso, sattannam bojjhanganam yena yena bojjhangena akankhami pubbanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena pubbanhasamayam viharami.
ps2.3:40.8: sayanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena sayanhasamayam viharami.
ps2.3:40.9: Satisambojjhango iti ce me, ‘avuso, hoti, appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti.
ps2.3:40.11: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami.

ps2.3:41.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, ranno va rajamahamattassa va nanarattanam dussanam dussakarandako puro assa.
ps2.3:41.2: So yannadeva dussayugam akankheyya pubbanhasamayam parupitum, tam tadeva dussayugam pubbanhasamayam parupeyya.
ps2.3:41.4: sayanhasamayam parupitum, tam tadeva dussayugam sayanhasamayam parupeyya.
ps2.3:41.5: Evameva khvaham, avuso, imesam sattannam bojjhanganam yena yena bojjhangena akankhami pubbanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena pubbanhasamayam viharami.
ps2.3:41.7: sayanhasamayam viharitum, tena tena bojjhangena sayanhasamayam viharami.
ps2.3:41.8: Satisambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti.
ps2.3:41.10: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami …pe…
ps2.3:41.11: upekkhasambojjhango iti ce me, avuso, hoti, ‘appamano’ti me hoti, ‘susamaraddho’ti me hoti.
ps2.3:41.13: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccaya me cavati’ti pajanami”.
ps2.3:42.1: Katham satisambojjhango iti ce me hotiti bojjhango?
ps2.3:42.4: Seyyathapi telappadipassa jhayato yavata acci tavata vanno, yavata vanno tavata acci.
ps2.3:43.1: Katham appamano iti ce me hotiti bojjhango?
ps2.3:43.2: Pamanabaddha kilesa, sabbe ca pariyutthana, ye ca sankhara ponobhavika appamano nirodho acalatthena asankhatatthena.
ps2.3:44.1: Katham susamaraddho iti ce me hotiti bojjhango?
ps2.3:44.2: Visama kilesa, sabbe ca pariyutthana, ye ca sankhara ponobhavika, samadhammo nirodho santatthena panitatthena.
ps2.3:44.3: Yavata nirodhupatthati tavata susamaraddho iti ce me hotiti bojjhango.
ps2.3:45.1: Katham “titthantanca nam titthati”ti pajanami; sacepi cavati “idappaccaya cavati”ti pajanami?
ps2.3:46.2: Anuppadam avajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, uppadam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, appavattam avajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, pavattam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, animittam avajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, nimittam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, nirodham avajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati, sankhare anavajjitatta satisambojjhango titthati—
ps2.3:47.2: Uppadam avajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, anuppadam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, pavattam avajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, appavattam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, nimittam avajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, animittam anavajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, sankhare avajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati, nirodham anavajjitatta satisambojjhango cavati—
ps2.3:47.4: Evam “titthantanca nam titthati”ti pajanami; sacepi cavati, “idappaccaya me cavati”ti pajanami …pe….
